You made a nice bridge, Jotaro.

Do not dig your nails in so much.
I-It feels like someone is tickling my back...
I cannot concentrate on my Stand like this!
Wh-When did all of these people show up?
Mr. Joestar, keep your voice down!
Everyone will think you are nuts!
I-I am not yelling for the fun of it!
Let us give him some change.
It is not easy having an older relative like that.
Let us get out of this crowd.
I cannot believe Kakyoin's Hierophant and Polnareff's Chariot
have shrunk themselves and entered Joestar's body.
They are trying to fight me?
I can see where they will exit
the artery wall that leads to the brain stem, and The Lovers.
We only have minutes left before the flesh bud
These tentacles are part the flesh bud!
We finally got to the brain stem,
but the flesh bud's already grown so much.
He is using his scissor-like hands to knead Mr. Joestar's brain cells
into a gooey mash, so he can feed them to the flesh bud!
If we cannot beat him and sever all the flesh bud's roots quickly,
it will grow big enough to eat through his brain!
But I have already seen through his moves.
If that is the best he can move, he is no match for...
And what you cut was not the Stand.
He was using the mash of kneaded brain cells
to disguise himself as my Hierophant Green!
And what you defeated was merely a dummy made of brain cells!
You were completely fooled, you idiots!
I am in such a good mood right now!
I need you to shine my shoes until they are as bright as I feel right now.
I want the sunny sky to reflect right off of them.
If you want, you can use your uniform to shine them.
Actually, why not lick them clean?
Punched in the gut Hit with a rock Stole my wallet Stole my watch Walked on, like a bridge, over a dirty river
I am writing down everything you owe me.
Made me scratch his back Made me shine his shoes Kicked me
I am going to make sure you pay it.
I can be forgetful, so I am writing it all down.
It will not matter in the end.
The one I just cut open!
In this world, the one who knows himself best wins!
In Aesop's fable, the tortoise beats the hare,
because the tortoise knew his own psyche and abilities better than anyone!
I know that I lack the power or speed necessary
to mortally wound either of you.
once you have acknowledged your own weaknesses!
M-More dummies made out of brain cells...
B-But a person can only have one Stand.
I was right next to that one.
The more we hit the wrong ones, the more it multiplies!
I cannot bear to watch you get hurt for the sake of my brain.
I cannot stand the thought of leaving things like this.
You are going to get killed!
Do not give up until the very end, Mr. Joestar!
Which one is the real one?
The weakest of all is also
Take a look at this gold bracelet.
It would make a girl happy,
if you were to give her something like this.
see that space in the glass?
Use your Stand to sneak through and steal it!
I told you to steal it, you dumbass!
I do not mind breaking the glass and taking it myself.
Are you okay with them catching me and beating the shit out of me?
Joseph would definitely die from the pain.
The salesman's looking the other way!
Please do not let him get away!
they chop a thief's fingers off!
You better not use your Stand against civilians.
Get out of our country, asshole!
We will let you go at that.
Because of the commotion you caused,
I was able to get my hands on something even better!
What the hell are you laughing about?
I am laughing in anticipation of the fun that is to come.
I am laughing because I have much more to look forward to now, and I am excited!
I am so excited for the moment when I get to pay you back.
Old Man Joestar will die within seconds.
That is the reality you are facing.
You do not know us very well.
Everything begins once you have acknowledged your own weaknesses, eh?
I would have to agree with that.
To know yourself is an important lesson...
But you clearly do not know your enemies well enough.
You have not done your research.
can spread its roots along the ground,
so I can inspect every single one of you!
That injury means that Kakyoin's on the attack now.
I wonder if I will still have my chance at payback once he is done.
He is realized he is out of his league!
He is trying to escape into the artery!
He is trying to get out of Mr. Joestar's brain!
Now we can be more bud dy- bud dy with Mr. Joestar.
If it is leaving my brain,
You are not going to tell me about what is happening to my grandfather?
What are you so panicked about?
Where are you trying to go?
You are not trying to run away, are you?
I will lie on the ground and lick your boots!
You can hit me as much as you would like!
The Lovers will soon be back!
This idiot, Jotaro, does not have a clue!
This time I will invade your brain from your ear!
I will give you pain that will make you wish you were dead!
I figured you were planning something like this.
Do not you know that my Stand, Star Platinum,
possesses excellent eyesight and precise reflexes?
Are you sure you did your research on us?
I-I meant your majesty's Stand is more powerful
and more just than any other!
I did not stand a chance, so it came back!
That attack broke my arm and my leg!
As for what you owe me...
I guess I will take your arm and leg as payment.
Do you swear that you will never appear before us again?
I will go to some deserted island!
I will go to the ends of the Earth and never come back!
You are not lying, are you?
The next time I see you, I will punch you one thousand times.
Let us play soccer over there!
Take a look at that girl over there!
My Stand, The Lovers, just went into that girl's ear.
He is heading for her brain.
Do not you dare move, Jotaro!
I am going to stab you in the back with this knife!
I will make sure you never move again!
Just try to attack me with your Star Platinum!
You would never kill such a young child, would you?
Were not you going to stab me?
Wh-What is this thing wrapped around me?!
to your Stand's leg as it escaped.
You must be totally oblivious if you did not realize that
you left a trail all the way to here.
Ask for forgiveness from Enyaba, the woman you killed.
We never had any intention of forgiving you in the first place.
You truly are the lowest scum in history.
You cannot pay back what you owe
I have this feeling like someone is staring at us,
Are you sure you are not just being paranoid?
I cannot help but feel that presence, too.
I really cannot shake the feeling that someone is staring at us.
